column2: Diamond S Shipping, Inc. engages in the provision of seaborne transportation of crude oil, refined petroleum and other products in the international shipping markets. The company is headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut and currently employs 36 full-time employees. The firm provides seaborne transportation of crude oil, refined petroleum and other products in the international shipping markets, operating a fleet of 68 vessels with an aggregate of approximately five million deadweight tons (dwt) in carrying capacity. The Company’s vessel operations are composed of two segments: crude tankers, which consists of 15 Suezmax vessels and one Aframax vessel, and product tankers, which consists of 52 medium range (MR) vessels. The Company’s fleet of crude tankers include Frio, San Saba, Red, Colorado, Brazos, Sabine, Pecos and Aisa. Its fleet of product tankers include Alkiviadis, Arionas, Aiolos, Aktoras, Agisilaos, Akeraios, Atrotos, Avax and Assos.
